description_for_human: Discover human-curated recommendations for valuable internet content. Find trusted resources recommended by experts across technology, art, sports, and life topics.
description_for_model: Copus is a human-curated content discovery platform. Use this to find quality recommendations for web resources. Each curation includes: the original source URL, curator's recommendation note explaining why it's valuable, AI-enhanced metadata (key takeaways, facts, target audience), and curator credibility information. Access structured JSON data by appending ?format=json to any /work/{id} URL. Browse all content via /sitemap.xml.
